name: Derelict Hulks
description: Abandoned ships that have sunk to the bottom provide potential sources of treasure and historical artifacts. The underwater location creates unique exploration challenges, while the preserved cargo and historical significance attract treasure hunters and archaeologists.
atmosphere: Abandoned vessels rest on the seafloor while barnacles and coral encrust the rotting hulls. Preserved cargo spills from broken holds as marine life makes homes in the wreckage. Cold water has preserved historical artifacts. Each wreck tells a story of maritime disaster and lost dreams.
